{"corpusName":"wiley","keywords":{"teeft":["doit","fonctionnaire","cette","peut","leur","normes","comportement","sont","dkontologie","aussi","conduite","fonction","principe","comme","gestion","fonctionnaires","supkrieur","publique","certains","professionnel","haut","certaines","entre","ceux","mesures","ainsi","cependant","rkgles","donc","dossier","rhgles","haut fonctionnaire","seulement","soient","mieux","pouvoir","fait","compte","exemple","professionnels","avec","service direct","fonction publique","recherche","administrateurs public","gouvernement","public doit avoir","public administrator","canadian public administration vers","administration publique","certains principe","devenu nkcessaire","professionnel fonctionnaire","milieu gouvernemental","fois clairs","seulement contienne","normes gknkrale","normes soient clairement dkfinies","rencontre public","obligation tant","public sert","public administration","cette faqon","cette situation","doivent guider","faut reconnaitre","diver groupes","dune part","responsabilitk administrative","code doit"]},"author":[{"name":"Ren\u00e9 Dussault","affiliations":["L'auteur est sous\u2010ministre de la Justice, gouvernement du Qu\u00e9bec. Cette allocution fut prononc\u00e9e lors du Colloque international de l'Ecole nationale d'administration publique, \u00e0 Quebec, le 29 mai 1979."]}],"articleId":["CAPA627"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/WNG-50DLJ8GT-M","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["article"],"abstract":"Sommaire. L'Administration publique poss\u00e8de un ensemble de particularit\u00e9s de fonctionnement qui rendent n\u00e9cessaire la reconnaissance de certains principes de d\u00e9ontologie. Les r\u00e8gies de d\u00e9ontologie fournissent aux administrateurs publics un cadre qui facilite, au b\u00e9n\u00e9fice du public, l'exercice des pouvoirs qui leur sont propres. Les r\u00e8gies les mieux connues sont de port\u00e9e g\u00e9n\u00e9rale et s'appliquent \u00e0 l'ensemble de; Administration. Par ailleurs, il est devenu n\u00e9cessaire de pr\u00e9ciser les r\u00e8gies g\u00e9n\u00e9rales traditionnelles et de concentrer les efforts sur la formulation de principes ou de r\u00e8gies de conduite qui refl\u00e8tent ad\u00e9quatement la sp\u00e9cificit\u00e9 des t\u00e2ches et des fonctions assum\u00e9es par l'administrateur public. A titre d'exemple, l'auteur souligne certains probl\u00e8mes particuliers reli\u00e9s aux fonctions du professionnel fonctionnaire, du chercheur en milieu gouvernemental, du responsable de la gestion du personnel, du fonctionnaire au service direct du public et du haut fonctionnaire. Le regroupement des r\u00e8gies de d\u00e9ontologie dans un code a l'avantage d'offrir \u00e0 l'administrateur public un ensemble de principes et de normes de comportement \u00e0 la fois clairs, pr\u00e9cis et ais\u00e9ment adaptables. Pour \u00eatre efficace, ce code doit refl\u00e9ter les valeurs actuelles de la soci\u00e9t\u00e9. II importe de plus que le code non seulement contienne des normes d'application g\u00e9n\u00e9rale mais que ces normes soient clairement d\u00e9finies et, au besoin, adapt\u00e9es \u00e0 certaines situations particuli\u00e8res que rencontre l'administrateur public. L'auteur souligne toutefois que le code n'est qu'un \u00e9l\u00e9ment utile d'un programme d'action plus global qui doit \u00eatre compl\u00e9t\u00e9 par des mesures ad\u00e9quates d'information et d'\u00e9ducation afin d'accro\u00eetre la conscience que l'administrateur public doit avoir de ses devoirs et de ses obligations tant vis\u2010\u00e0\u2010vis son employeur que vis\u2010\u00e0\u2010vis le public qu'il sert. Abstract. Public administration has various characteristic ways of functioning that make the recognition of certain ethical principles obligatory. Rules of conduct provide public administrators with a framework which facilitates the exercise of their particular powers for the benefit of the public. The best known rules are of general significance and apply to all aspects of public administration. However, it has become necessary to make the traditional general rules more specific and to concentrate on the formulation of principles or rules of ethics which adequately reflect the distinctiveness of the duties and functions assumed by the public administrator. As an illustration of some of these, the author mentions special problems encountered in the work of the civil service professional, the researcher in government, the staff manager, the civil servant in direct contact with the public, and the senior civil servant. Consolidating rules of ethics into a code has the advantage of putting a comprehensive set of principles and standards of behaviour at the public administrator's disposal which are at once clear, precise and readily adaptable. To be efficacious, such a code must reflect the commonly held values of society. It is also important that the code not only contain standards of general applicability, but that these standards be clearly defined and adapted where need be to particular situations facing the public administrator. The author emphasizes, however, that the code is only one useful element in a more comprehensive programme of action, one that must be supplemented by adequate information and educational measures designed to heighten the public administrator's awareness of his duties and obligations towards both his employer and the public he serves.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":1}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":0},"tdmReady":false,"score":8,"pdfWordCount":5165,"pdfCharCount":29116,"pdfVersion":1.3,"pdfPageCount":12,"pdfPageSize":"468 x 684 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":430,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":false,"abstractWordCount":538,"abstractCharCount":3653,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Vers un code de d\u00e9ontologie adapt\u00e9 aux diverses fonctions de l'administrat\u00f8ur public","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[],"genre":["article"],"host":{"title":"Canadian Public Administration","language":["unknown"],"doi":["10.1111/(ISSN)1754-7121"],"issn":["0008-4840"],"eissn":["1754-7121"],"publisherId":["CAPA"],"volume":"22","issue":"4","pages":{"first":"627","last":"638","total":"12"},"genre":["journal"]},"namedEntities":{"unitex":{"date":["11s"]}},"ark":["ark:/67375/WNG-50DLJ8GT-M"],"categories":{"wos":["1 - social science","2 - public administration"],"scienceMetrix":["1 - economic & social sciences","2 - social sciences","3 - political science & public administration"],"scopus":["1 - Social Sciences","2 - Social Sciences","3 - Public Administration","1 - Social Sciences","2 - Social Sciences","3 - Sociology and Political Science"],"inist":["1 - sciences humaines et sociales"]},"publicationDate":"1979","copyrightDate":"1979","enrichments":{"type":["multicat","nb","teeft","unitex"]},"doi":["10.1111/j.1754-7121.1979.tb01842.x"]}

La part de la d\u00e9pense \u00e9nerg\u00e9tique li\u00e9e \u00e0 l\u2019activit\u00e9 physique est modulable et varie selon la quantit\u00e9 d\u2019activit\u00e9 physique. La mesure de la quantit\u00e9 d\u2019activit\u00e9 physique est utile dans de nombreuses situations normales ou pathologiques chez l\u2019enfant et l\u2019adolescent. Plusieurs outils existent pour mesurer la quantit\u00e9 d\u2019activit\u00e9 physique. Les questionnaires demeurent les plus utilis\u00e9s en raison de leur faible co\u00fbt et de leur facilit\u00e9 de mise en place, cependant ils surestiment syst\u00e9matiquement l\u2019activit\u00e9 physique r\u00e9elle. La technique de la fr\u00e9quence cardiaque n\u00e9cessite des calibrations individuelles en laboratoire et celle-ci peut \u00eatre augment\u00e9e dans des circonstances (stress, temp\u00e9rature\u2026) autres que l\u2019augmentation de l\u2019activit\u00e9 physique. Le podom\u00e8tre mesure le nombre de pas, mais ne permet pas de quantifier les profils d\u2019activit\u00e9 physique. L\u2019acc\u00e9l\u00e9rom\u00e9trie mesure les mouvements (acc\u00e9l\u00e9rations et d\u00e9c\u00e9l\u00e9rations) du sujet. Cette mesure objective et pr\u00e9cise peut \u00eatre utilis\u00e9e dans les conditions normales de vie pour un faible co\u00fbt. Le choix de l\u2019outil d\u00e9pend essentiellement des objectifs recherch\u00e9s par le clinicien ou le Elle avait pour objectif de d\u00e9crire les activit\u00e9s professionnelles de ces dipl\u00f4m\u00e9s en relation avec l\u2019agression sexuelle (AS) et la violence dans les relations intimes (VRI). Les r\u00e9sultats indiquent que plus de la moiti\u00e9 des dipl\u00f4m\u00e9s en sexologie accorde une part de leurs activit\u00e9s professionnelles \u00e0 l\u2019AS et la VRI et que plus de 20\u00a0% d\u2019entre eux y consacrent au moins le quart de leur pratique. Les champs de pratique exerc\u00e9s dans plus de 50\u00a0% de ces activit\u00e9s sont la relation d\u2019aide et la pratique clinique. La plupart de ces dipl\u00f4m\u00e9s travaillent en relation avec les populations de victimes et la moiti\u00e9 d\u2019entre eux intervient en ce qui a trait aux agresseurs. Ces dipl\u00f4m\u00e9s exercent majoritairement en pratique priv\u00e9e ou dans des milieux qui ne sont pas sp\u00e9cialis\u00e9s en mati\u00e8re d\u2019AS et/ou de VRI. La plupart d\u2019entre eux a effectu\u00e9 un stage li\u00e9 \u00e0 l\u2019AS et/ou la VRI dans le cadre de la formation universitaire et pr\u00e8s de la moiti\u00e9 a particip\u00e9 \u00e0 une activit\u00e9 de formation continue traitant de ces probl\u00e9matiques. Peu de r\u00e9pondants ont pr\u00e9sent\u00e9 un int\u00e9r\u00eat pour des activit\u00e9s de formation continue. Les principaux th\u00e8mes rapport\u00e9s \u00e9taient reli\u00e9s directement \u00e0 l\u2019intervention, alors que les sujets de nature empirique et th\u00e9orique \u00e9taient moins relev\u00e9s. Cette \u00e9tude descriptive permet de mieux conna\u00eetre le travail des dipl\u00f4m\u00e9s du d\u00e9partement de sexologie de l\u2019UQAM en mati\u00e8re d\u2019AS et de VRI et de confirmer l\u2019importance de ces probl\u00e9matiques dans la pratique sexologique au Famille"]}],"articleId":["CARS301"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/WNG-XJLNH044-H","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["article"],"abstract":"During the last decades, the survey method became of major importance to sociological research and gave rise to significant strides in social science, especially in fostering the working up of increasingly precise and sophisticated techniques of measurement. Nevertheless, one question, preliminary to any formal or quantitative analysis of a survey's outcomes, should be further examined: that of the very nature of what is actually gathered or investigated in sociological surveys. After sketching some of the main historical roots of the survey method, this paper addresses itself to this latter issue and discusses the meaning and limits of the sociological knowledge derived from scientific surveys. Depuis quelques d\u00e9cennies, la m\u00e9thode du sondage scientifique a pris une importance grandissante dans la recheiche sociologique; cette m\u00e9thode a, en outre, permis d'importants progres des sciences sociales et n\u00e9cessit\u00e9 l'\u00e9laboration d'instruments et de techniques de mesure de plus en plus raffin\u00e9s. Apr\u00e8s avoir rappel\u00e9 les principales racines historiques de cette m\u00e9thode d'investigation des ph\u00e9nom\u00e8nes sociaux, cet article pose la question, pr\u00e9alable \u00e0 toute formalisation et \u00e0 toute analyse des r\u00e9sultats, de la nature m\u00eame des objets susceptibles d'\u00eatre appr\u00e9hend\u00e9s par une telle m\u00e9thode. II cherche ainsi \u00e0 d\u00e9terminer la valeur et les limites du savoir sociologique g\u00e9n\u00e9r\u00e9\u00e0 I'aide des sondages scientifiques.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":1}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":87},"tdmReady":false,"score":7.472,"pdfWordCount":16334,"pdfCharCount":91118,"pdfVersion":1.3,"pdfPageCount":24,"pdfPageSize":"612 x 792 pts (letter)","pdfWordsPerPage":681,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":206,"abstractCharCount":1418,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Sondages et savoir sociologiques","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"title":"Social Surveys and Social Action","author":[{"name":"Mark Abrams"}],"publicationDate":"1951"},{"title":"Les echelles d'attitudes","author":[{"name":"Victor Alexandre"}],"publicationDate":"1971"},{"title":"The growth of social research in the United States","author":[{"name":"Harry Alpert"}],"publicationDate":"1959"},{"title":"Economic and Social Investigations in Manchester, 1833\u20131933","author":[{"name":"Thomas S. {"corpusName":"edp-sciences","author":[{"name":"Alexandre Novo","affiliations":["Interne DES de psychiatrie \u00e0 l\u2019Universit\u00e9 Reims Champagne-Ardenne, doctorant en recherche psychanalytique et interdisciplinaire, CRPMS, \u00e0 l\u2019Universit\u00e9 Paris Diderot, Paris, France","E-mail: alexandrenovo86@gmail.com"]},{"name":"Laure Woestelandt","affiliations":["P\u00e9dopsychiatre, chef de clinique assistant \u00e0 l\u2019Universit\u00e9 Paris Descartes, H\u00f4pital Necker Enfants Malades, 75015Paris, France"]}],"subject":[{"lang":["fre"],"value":"recherche qualitative"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"accueil familial"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"psychanalyse"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"qualitative research"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"foster care"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"psychoanalysis"}],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/80W-8JZ26XBS-5","language":["fre"],"originalGenre":["research-article"],"abstract":"En s\u2019appuyant sur l\u2019exp\u00e9rience de l\u2019\u00e9tude en cours : \u00ab Devenir des enfants ayant \u00e9t\u00e9 plac\u00e9s en accueil familial th\u00e9rapeutique \u00bb, nous tenterons de d\u00e9crire et de clarifier la Grounded Theory (GT). Nous insisterons sur sa valeur ajout\u00e9e dans la recherche m\u00e9dicale, et psychiatrique tout particuli\u00e8rement. Une valeur d\u2019ores et d\u00e9j\u00e0 reconnue et usit\u00e9e dans le monde scientifique notamment en dehors de la France, \u00e0 l\u2019international. La GT est une m\u00e9thode qualitative qui apporte une nouvelle fa\u00e7on de comprendre un sujet, d\u2019aborder un fait humain. Elle favorise l\u2019innovation scientifique par une m\u00e9thode d\u2019analyse enracin\u00e9e dans les donn\u00e9es du terrain. Une approche inductive qui fait \u00e9merger des th\u00e9ories nouvelles plus ou moins en lien avec des th\u00e9ories pr\u00e9existantes. Dans un premier temps nous pr\u00e9senterons sa cr\u00e9ation et ses \u00e9volutions depuis la publication du livre de Glaser et Strauss en 1967. Puis nous expliquerons les diff\u00e9rentes \u00e9tapes permettant aux codeurs de se d\u00e9tacher de leurs pr\u00e9conceptions et de ne pas plaquer leurs propres cat\u00e9gories. Une m\u00e9thodologie qui suit 6 \u00e9tapes autour desquelles un cadre d\u2019analyse facilite la lecture de la polyphonie des entretiens. Un chapitre est \u00e9galement consacr\u00e9 \u00e0 la place de la GT au sein des m\u00e9thodes qualitatives, ainsi qu\u2019aux liens possibles entre GT et psychanalyse. Enfin, nous critiquerons l\u2019int\u00e9r\u00eat de l\u2019utilisation de cet outil dans les \u00e9tudes m\u00e9dicales \u00e0 venir, notamment fran\u00e7aises, soit comme outil seul mais surtout dans un alliage avec d\u2019autres instruments quantitatifs.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":151,"sectionCount":22,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":4,"level":0},{"sectionCount":7,"level":1},{"sectionCount":11,"level":2}],"sectionDepth":3,"imageCount":1,"tableCount":0,"refCount":35},"tdmReady":true,"score":9.82,"pdfWordCount":10429,"pdfCharCount":58921,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":15,"pdfPageSize":"581.112 x 841.922 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":695,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":235,"abstractCharCount":1534,"keywordCount":6},"title":"Recherches qualitatives; grounded theory/th\u00e9orisation ancr\u00e9e, ses \u00e9volutions, sa m\u00e9thodologie, son application dans la recherche m\u00e9dicale et psychanalytique","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"author":[{"name":"J Angot"},{"name":"P Milano"}],"host":{"editor":"R.A. La compr\u00e9hension de cette loi biologique met en \u00e9vidence un r\u00f4le cl\u00e9 des signaux de la communication cellulaire, comme les cytokines, facteurs de croissance et chimiokines mais aussi celui de la matrice extracellulaire dans l\u2019organisation de cette communication. Ces m\u00e9canismes du vivant sont d\u00e9r\u00e9gul\u00e9s lors des l\u00e9sions tissulaires, laissant des traces ou cicatrices. En reconstituant le microenvironnement de la matrice extracellulaire, il est possible d\u2019\u00e9viter la r\u00e9paration pour favoriser la r\u00e9g\u00e9n\u00e9ration du tissu l\u00e9s\u00e9. Les glycosaminoglycanes, et plus particuli\u00e8rement les h\u00e9paranes sulfates, en participant \u00e0 l\u2019organisation de l\u2019\u00e9chafaudage matriciel, sont impliqu\u00e9s dans la communication cellulaire. Cet article d\u00e9crit comment, en inventant des mim\u00e9tiques de ces sucres ou agents de r\u00e9g\u00e9n\u00e9ration tissulaire (RGTA\u00ae), une \u00e9quipe universitaire fran\u00e7aise a pu d\u00e9montrer que les mammif\u00e8res pouvaient r\u00e9g\u00e9n\u00e9rer en recr\u00e9ant le bon microenvironnement cellulaire. Apr\u00e8s un premier d\u00e9veloppement clinique dans deux pathologies chroniques s\u00e9v\u00e8res (ulc\u00e8res de corn\u00e9e et de peau), nous montrons maintenant dans cet article le potentiel en chirurgie plastique de ces agents RGTA\u00ae, tant pour r\u00e9guler la fibrose que pour assurer une r\u00e9paration rapide et de meilleure {"corpusName":"wiley","keywords":{"teeft":["recherche","cette","peut","applique","entre","chercheur","probleme","niveau","sont","tres","problemes","moins","realisation","comme","leur","dont","celle","cellules","fondamentale","biologie","aussi","exemple","encore","temp","appliquee","caractere","celui","contexte","processus","caractere applique","tissus vegetaux","cellules vegetales","avec","paul steck","recherche pure","recherche fondamentale","grande echelle","cette necessite","pourrait appeler","effets pervers","realisation concrete","recherche appliquee","donne naissance","multiplication vegetative","notre second exemple","modele biologique","fasse apparaitre","cette exigence","cette prise","sans"]},"author":[{"name":"Par Paul Steck","affiliations":["Ch\u00e2teau de Montvaillant, F\u201030460 La Salle"]}],"articleId":["DLTC105"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/WNG-VL2N2LKH-T","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["article"],"abstract":"R\u00e9sum\u00e9: La scission ressentie aujourd'hui entre une recherche dite fondamentale, suppos\u00e9e desint\u00e9ress\u00e9e, et une recherche de caract\u00e8re appliqu\u00e9 orient\u00e9e vers une production, ne repose pas lant sur des differ\u00e9nces de m\u00e9thode que sur la motivation du chercheur. Les probl\u00e8mes li\u00e9s \u00e0\u013eessor actuel des applications de la biologie, en particulier \u00e0 celui des \u2264biotechnologies\u2265, permettent de poser la question de la f\u00e9condit\u00e9 du savoir dans un contexte dialectique liant indissociablement \u013eacte r\u00e9alisateur aux processus cognitifs. Summary: It is often felt that there exists a division between research referred to as fundamental \u2013 assumed to be disinterested \u2013 and research of an applied nature \u2013 which is orientated towards a production. This dichotomy is not based so much upon methodological differences as upon the research worker's attitude and motives. The problems associated with the actual rise of applications of biology, particularly those termed \u2264biotechnologies\u2265, allows one to examine the question of knowledge's fruitfulness in a dialectical context joining irreversibly concrete actions to cognitive processes. Zusammenfassung: Die heutzutage empfundene Spaltung zwischen einer uneigenn\u00fctzig gemeinten sogenannten Grundforschung und einer auf Produktion eingestellten angewandten Forschung beruht auf Unterschieden weniger in der Methode des Forschers als vielmehr in dessen Motivation. Die Pro\u2010bleme, die mit dem gegenw\u00e4rtigen Aufschwung der Anwendungen der Biologie (Biotechnologien) verbunden sind, f\u00fchren dazu, die Frage der FYuchtbarkeit des Wissens in einen dialektischen Kontext zu stellen, der die verwirklichende Tat unlSsbar mit den Erkenntnisprozessen verbindet.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":1}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":21},"tdmReady":false,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":231,"abstractCharCount":1686,"keywordCount":0,"score":8.381,"pdfWordCount":4942,"pdfCharCount":27700,"pdfVersion":1.4,"pdfPageCount":12,"pdfPageSize":"450 x 666 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":412,"pdfText":true},"title":"Situation de la recherche \u00e0 caract\u00e8re appliqu\u00e9","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"title":"Les somnanbules.","author":[{"name":"A. Longitudinal Data"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Structural Equation Models"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Subjective Well-Being."}],"articleId":["10.1177_075910639605000104"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/M70-92JG4ZFF-P","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["research-article"],"abstract":"Structural Equation Models and Direction of Causality with Longitudinal Data - An Application to Subjective Well-Being. When two variables are correlated, the researcher is often confronted with the question of the direction of causality. This substanttve question is, however, difficult to answer, especially when use of an expertimental design is impossible. In such situations, longitudinal data furnish some invaluable information: the temporal order of the variables. Unfortunately, the temporal order is not sufficient to answer questions of causality. The well-known technique of cross-lagged correlations has been criticized because of its unrealistic assumptions. The major purpose of this paper is to illustrate the use of structural equations models to help answer questions regarding the direction of causality in longitudinal data. After a brief presentation of structural equations models, focalizing on the LISREL model, we stress their advantages over more traditional approaches. An empirical illustration is presented which uses the data on subjective well-being published by Headey et aL (1991). We study the direction of causality between marriage satisfaction and general satisfaction. The different models tested seem to infirm the conclusions of Headey et al.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":0,"sectionCount":0,"sectionLevels":[],"sectionDepth":0,"imageCount":1,"tableCount":3,"refCount":35},"tdmReady":false,"score":7.863,"pdfWordCount":11242,"pdfCharCount":63096,"pdfVersion":1.4,"pdfPageCount":36,"pdfPageSize":"372 x 608 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":312,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":183,"abstractCharCount":1282,"keywordCount":4},"title":"Mod\u00e8les d'\u00e9quations structurales et sens de la causalit\u00e9 dans les \u00e9tudes longitudinales: Une application au bien-\u00eatre subjectif","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"host":{"publisher":"Bentler & Speckart","title":"ne sont alors plus forc&eacute;ment &eacute;gaux dans ces solutions car le changement d'&eacute;chelle impliqu&eacute; dans la standardisation induit un changement non uniforme des param&egrave;tres","publicationDate":"1981"}},{"host":{"author":[{"name":"F M Andrews"}],"title":"Research on the Quality of Life","publicationDate":"1986"}},{"host":{"editor":"l'atelier LISREL. Dans le contexte actuel caract\u00e9ris\u00e9 par une demande croissante de recherche de la part des acteurs priv\u00e9s et publics, la recherche publique doit s'adapter. Dans le cas des recherches \u00ab pour \u00e5 et \u00ab sur \u00e5 le d\u00e9veloppement r\u00e9gional, cela se traduit par une double exigence : constituer des collectifs pluridisciplinaires de chercheurs et mettre en place une forme de partenariat sp\u00e9cifique, m\u00ealant de nombreux acteurs r\u00e9unis dans un m\u00eame espace g\u00e9ographique. Mais au sein des institutions de recherche, ces d\u00e9marches, parce qu'elles sortent des canons traditionnels, posent la question de leur \u00e9valuation. Pour moi, ce qui fonde le caract\u00e8re scientifique c'est la mani\u00e8re de faire de la recherche plus que le caract\u00e8re disciplinaire de l'objet. Cet article vise \u00e0 montrer que l'\u00e9valuation ne peut plus se restreindre aux seuls r\u00e9sultats et qu'il est n\u00e9cessaire d'\u00e9valuer comment ces recherches se m\u00e8nent.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":15,"sectionCount":2,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":2,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":3,"tableCount":1,"refCount":46},"tdmReady":true,"score":8,"pdfWordCount":8434,"pdfCharCount":46330,"pdfVersion":1.2,"pdfPageCount":8,"pdfPageSize":"594 x 756 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":1054,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":272,"abstractCharCount":1819,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Les fondements \u00e9pist\u00e9mologiques de l'\u00e9valuation des recherches tourn\u00e9es vers l'action","hasFormula":false,"pii":["S1240-1307(01)89044-0"],"refBibs":[{"host":{"author":[{"name":"G Bachelard"}],"title":"La formation de I'esprit scientifique. {"corpusName":"emerald","keywords":{"teeft":["tourisme","cours","conomique","touristique","encore","villes","droit","touristiques","heure","cette","sont","exemple","niveau","faut","suisse","fait","quelques","professeur","leur","grandes","moins","aussi","partie","conomiques","dont","comme","tudes","leurs","domaine","avec","soit","ceux","entre","tous","autres","enseignement","dirig","recherches","scientifiques","donc","hunziker","travail","economie","scientifique","calorie alimentaires","statistique","recherche","sou","recherches touristiques","grandes villes"]},"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/4W2-LJBPP19H-7","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["review-article"],"abstract":"C'est un lieu commun que de r\u00e9affirmer ici l'importance croissante des mouvements touristiques dans le monde actuel sur les plans \u00e9conomique, social, culturel ou politique. Dans le domaine \u00e9conomique seulement, leur d\u00e9veloppement entra\u02c6ne des cons\u00e9quences d\u00e9cisives tant sur les relations \u00e9conomiques internationales (le probl\u00e8me des balances des paiements se pose diff\u00e9remment maintenant que les \u00e9changes de personnes viennent compl\u00e9ter les \u00e9changes de marchandises) que sur l'orientation des activit\u00e9s \u00e9conomiques internes (citons, par exemple, les investissements touristiques \u2014 h\u00f4tellerie ou moyens de transport \u2014 les changements de la consommation par suite de la croissance dans les budgets familiaux du poste distractions et voyages \u2014 l'am\u00e9lioration du niveau de vie \u2014 le d\u00e9veloppement du secteur tertiaire, commerce et services \u2014 l'urbanisation, dont le tourisme est, en tant qu'\u00e9vasion hors des grandes agglom\u00e9rations, une des cons\u00e9quences, etc.). Et en face de ce fait: il n'est pas un secteur de l'activit\u00e9 \u00e9conomique qui ne soit transform\u00e9, plus ou moins profond\u00e9ment, par l'essor du tourisme \u2014 une constatation am\u00e8re: ce ph\u00e9nom\u00e8ne d\u00e9cisif, \u00e9conomique, social, d\u00e9mographique, culturel n'occupe encore qu'une place tout \u00e0 fait insignifiante, quand elle n'est pas nulle, dans l'enseignement sup\u00e9rieur de la plupart des pays. Il serait cependant tr\u00e8s d\u00e9sirable qu'une meilleure connaissance de ces ph\u00e9nom\u00e8nes, sans nul doute appel\u00e9s \u00e0 poursuivre encore leur d\u00e9veloppement, soit plus largement r\u00e9pandue parmi les jeunes destin\u00e9s \u00e0 former les cadres sup\u00e9rieurs, c'est\u2010\u00e0\u2010dire l'\u00e9lite des nations. Many view the endogenous historical development of disciplines like sociology as the actual ferment of a serious decline in the normativeness of social science\u2010derived knowledge. The author of this article speaks out against a sociological epistemology trend that argues that explanatory pluralism undermines the credibility of this knowledge. Moreover, he takes a stand against another trend denouncing the instrumentalization of the social sciences, by showing that an enlightened awareness of the limits and obstacles of social science reasoning makes it possible to circumvent this instrumentalization and foster the fundamental nature of social knowledge. The author offers an epistemological reading of Francine Saillant's Cancer et culture to support his thesis. Depuis quelques ann\u00e9es d\u00e9j\u00e0, il est de mise de s'interroger sur la l\u00e9gitimit\u00e9 et la validit\u00e9 de l'entreprise des sciences sociales. Plusieurs voient dans le d\u00e9veloppement historique endog\u00e8ne de disciplines comme la sociologie le ferment m\u00eame d'un s\u00e9v\u00e8re recul de la norma\u2010tivit\u00e9 de la connaissance produite par les sciences sociales. L'auteur de cet article s'inscrit en faux contre une certaine tendance de l'\u00e9pist\u00e9mologie sociologique qui veut que le pluralisme explicatif nuise \u00e0 la cr\u00e9dibilit\u00e9 de cette connaissance. Qui plus est, il prend le contre\u2010pied d'une autre tendance qui s'insurge contre l'instru\u2010mentalisation des sciences sociales en d\u00e9montrant que la conscience \u00e9clair\u00e9e des limites et des obstacles du raisonnement propre \u00e0 ces sciences permet de contourner cette instrumentalisation et de nourrir l'aspect fondamental du savoir sur le social. L'auteur propose une lecture \u00e9pist\u00e9mologique de l'ouvrage Cancer et culture de Francine Saillant pour \u00e9tayer sa th\u00e8se. Pour stupide que f\u00fbt l'entendement d'un homme, il serait toujours sup\u00e9rieur \u00e0 celui d'\u00eatres irrationnels. Jorge Luis Borges, L'Immortel","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":1}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":24},"tdmReady":false,"score":8,"pdfWordCount":7935,"pdfCharCount":42984,"pdfVersion":1.3,"pdfPageCount":17,"pdfPageSize":"612 x 792 pts (letter)","pdfWordsPerPage":467,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":291,"abstractCharCount":2004,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Les obstacles et les limites du raisonnement mis \u00e0 l\u2018\u0153uvre en sciences sociales: un exemple","hasFormula":false,"genre":["article"],"host":{"title":"Canadian Review of Sociology/Revue canadienne de sociologie","language":["unknown"],"doi":["10.1111/(ISSN)1755-618X"],"issn":["1755-6171"],"eissn":["1755-618X"],"publisherId":["CARS"],"volume":"36","issue":"3","pages":{"first":"371","last":"387","total":"17"},"genre":["journal"]},"namedEntities":{"unitex":{"orgName":["Scandinavian University"],"persName":["C. {"corpusName":"cambridge","author":[{"name":"Gilles Lane","affiliations":["Universit\u00e9 du Qu\u00e9bec \u00e0 Trois-Rivi\u00e8res"]}],"articleId":["02565"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/6GQ-RHXDH5C9-5","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["research-article"],"abstract":"On pourrait dire que parler, c'est d'abord produire des sons conventionnels pour faire comprendre \u00e0 quelqu'un ce qu'on voudrait lui faire comprendre. M\u00eame si l'on constate que la parole est souvent utilis\u00e9e non seulement pour faire comprendre, mais aussi pour promettre, ou commander, ou avertir, etc., il n'en demeure pas moins que l'on promet, par exemple, en parlant, et que promettre, c'est promettre, alors que parler, c'est autre chose. Par contre, il nous arrive aussi de dire qu'un magn\u00e9tophone parle, qu'un r\u00eaveur ou un perroquet parlent, qu'une peinture ou un paysage naturel \u00ab nous parlent \u00bb, etc. On estime cependant que plusieurs de ces \u00ab paroles \u00bb sont seulement m\u00e9taphoriques: elles ne seraient pas des paroles au sens \u00ab fort \u00bb, mais plut\u00f4t par extension, par analogie, ou entendues dans un sens restreint. Et l'on voudrait pr\u00e9ciser ce sens fort, \u00ab pr\u00e9gnant \u00bb, c'est-\u00e0-dire celui qui correspondrait au parler v\u00e9ritable, \u00e0 l'essence de la parole.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":22,"sectionCount":5,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":5,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":2,"tableCount":4,"refCount":0},"tdmReady":true,"score":8.86,"pdfWordCount":8060,"pdfCharCount":40965,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":19,"pdfPageSize":"395.28 x 632.88 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":424,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":false,"abstractWordCount":155,"abstractCharCount":960,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Qu'est-ce que \u00ab parler \u00bb ?","hasFormula":false,"pii":["S0012217300025658"],"refBibs":[],"genre":["research-article"],"host":{"title":"Dialogue","language":["unknown"],"issn":["0012-2173"],"eissn":["1759-0949"],"publisherId":["DIA"],"volume":"13","issue":"2","pages":{"first":"327","last":"345","total":"19"},"genre":["journal"]},"namedEntities":{"unitex":{"date":["1974"]}},"ark":["ark:/67375/6GQ-RHXDH5C9-5"],"categories":{"wos":[],"scienceMetrix":["1 - arts & humanities","2 - philosophy & theology","3 - philosophy"],"scopus":["1 - Social Sciences","2 - Arts and Humanities","3 - Philosophy"]},"publicationDate":"1974","copyrightDate":"1974","enrichments":{"type":["grobidFulltext","multicat","unitex"]},"doi":["10.1017/S0012217300025658"]}

{"corpusName":"springer-ebooks","keywords":{"teeft":["metaheuristics","metaheuristic","algorithm","optimization","metaheuristics network","heuristic","timetabling","optimization problem","experimental methodology","iterated local search","second phase","methodology","other hand","manageability concern","formal analysis","combinatorial optimization","free parameter","optimization community","wolpert macready","academic research group","formal tool","optimization method","optimization algorithm","same time","ultimate goal","such problem","practical relevance","good result","whole class","probability measure","probabilistic model","free lunch theorem","empirical evaluation","model selection problem","major impact","practical application","timetabling problem","common software library","third phase","practitioner"]},"author":[{"name":"Mauro Birattari","affiliations":["Chercheur qualifi\u00e9 du F.R.S.-FNRS, IRIDIA, CoDE, FSA - CP 194/6, Universit\u00e9 Libre de Bruxelles, Avenue Franklin Roosevelt 50, 1050, Brussels, Belgium","E-mail: mbiro@ulb.ac.be"]}],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/HCB-J2B8H9H8-R","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["OriginalPaper"],"abstract":"Abstract: Aiming at the best is one of the most fundamental traits of intelligence. In all activities, human beings tend to maximize benefit or, equivalently, to minimize inconvenience in some context-dependent sense. The pursuit of the best appears so connatural with the human mind that when we do not recognize it in somebody\u2019s behavior we readily qualify him/her as irrational. Quite naturally, along the centuries man has devoted much effort to the development of formal tools that help in spotting optimality. Mathematical optimization, as we know it nowadays, is the result of this effort: A collection of powerful methods and algorithms for tackling a large variety of different problems. In the contemporary world, optimization plays an extremely important role in all branches of engineering and has therefore a huge economical relevance. During the last two decades in particular, the ever increasing availability of computing power has further enlarged the set of optimization problems that can be effectively handled.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":11,"sectionCount":2,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":2}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":1,"tableCount":1,"refCount":0},"tdmReady":true,"score":8.213,"pdfWordCount":4317,"pdfCharCount":23947,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":10,"pdfPageSize":"430 x 659.996 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":432,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":false,"abstractWordCount":158,"abstractCharCount":1030,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Introduction","hasFormula":false,"chapterId":["1","Chap1"],"refBibs":[],"genre":["article"],"serie":{"title":"Studies in Computational Intelligence","language":["unknown"],"copyrightDate":"2009","issn":["1860-949X"],"eissn":["1860-9503"],"editor":[{"name":"Janusz Kacprzyk","affiliations":["Systems Research Institute, Polish Academy of Sciences, ul. {"corpusName":"cambridge","author":[{"name":"St\u00e9phane Courtois","affiliations":["Universit\u00e9 du Qu\u00e9bec \u00e0 Trois-Rivi\u00e8res"]}],"articleId":["00722"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/6GQ-J9FT0J72-N","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["research-article"],"abstract":"The general aim of this paper is to question the idea that hermeneutic and critical social sciences have to be conceived as specific embodiments of the scientific enterprise. This idea is rather implicit in Habermas's work, but has its grounds in his thesis about the argumentative unity of all sciences, upheld for the first time in 1973. Such a point of view turns out to be untenable for two reasons. First, the indiscriminating inclusion of the hermeneutic and critical social sciences in scientific enterprise raises problems of consistency with regard to the systematic guidelines of The Theory of Communicative Action. Moreover, the thesis of argumentative unity of the sciences itself is incompatible with Habermas's methodological conception of the role of Verstehen in the social sciences developed in section 1.4 of the book. Finally, the author argues that this conception calls for another understanding of the status and role of the hermeneutic and critical disciplines, which is outlined in some detail.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":51,"sectionCount":11,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":11,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":1,"tableCount":2,"refCount":36},"tdmReady":true,"score":8.92,"pdfWordCount":12559,"pdfCharCount":74978,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":30,"pdfPageSize":"408.24 x 634.32 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":419,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":160,"abstractCharCount":1018,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Les disciplines herm\u00e9neutiques et la th\u00e9orie critique sont-elles des formes de la rationalit\u00e9 scientifique?","hasFormula":false,"pii":["S0012217300007228"],"refBibs":[{"host":{"pages":{"first":"4"},"author":[{"name":"J Cf"},{"name":"Habermas"}],"title":"Zur Logik der Sozialwissenschaften, Francfort, Suhrkamp, 1982, p. 10; trad, franc, par R. Cette r\u00e9flexion d\u00e9coule des observations recueillies dans un centre d\u2019action m\u00e9dicosociale pr\u00e9coce sp\u00e9cialis\u00e9 pour d\u00e9ficients de la vue qui accueille des enfants de z\u00e9ro \u00e0 six ans et leurs familles. Le psychologue se pr\u00e9sente, dans ce cadre, \u00e0 la fois comme th\u00e9rapeute, m\u00e9diateur, conseiller, expert et animateur. mechanism"]},"author":[{"name":"STOFER Rafael","affiliations":["LASMAS-CNRS, Universit\u00e9 de Lille 1"]}],"articleId":["10.1177_075910630207600103"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/M70-JLXS9MKD-H","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["research-article"],"abstract":"Comparison of Structural Analysis and Scientometric Analysis in the Study of Scientific Production: This article is based on the study of networks of advice, coauthorship and cocitation among a certain category of French cancer researchers. We show that the study of scientific production based on strictly quantitative indicators, characteristic of scientometry, is not sufficient. It is also necessary to take into account social networks constructed among such researchers to have a more complete view of a scientific domain and how it is organized. In a comparative process, we present the structural approach which answers this requirement through the use of hypotheses concerning intra-organization of interdependent entrepreneurs that are tested at the inter-organizational level. The two approaches\u2014scientometrics and structural analysis\u2014are then shown to be strongly complementary in their results which lead to a better understanding of how a scientific field of research functions and the roles of the different actors. Scientific Production, Structural Analysis, Scientometric Analysis, Elites, Inter-Organizational Analysis.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":29,"sectionCount":5,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":5,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":7,"tableCount":4,"refCount":33},"tdmReady":true,"score":8.896,"pdfWordCount":8921,"pdfCharCount":46077,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":20,"pdfPageSize":"355.906 x 602.729 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":446,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":158,"abstractCharCount":1137,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Comparaison De L'Analyse Structurale Et De L'Analyse Scientometrique Dans L'Etude De La Production Scientifique","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"host":{"pages":{"last":"288","first":"260"},"author":[{"name":"R Aro N"}],"publisher":"Annales Europeennes de Socio logie","title":"C lasse sociale, classe politiquc, classe dirigeante"}},{"author":[{"name":"P M Blau"}],"host":{"title":"J. Ce processus s\u0092appuie sur une conception sp\u00e9cifique du processus d\u0092innovation lui-m\u00eame. Dans ce contexte, l\u0092innovation est un processus cognitif, qui s\u0092exprime \u00e0 plusieurs niveaux \u0096 local, national, sectoriel et international \u0096 et dans de nombreuses dimensions \u0096 technologique, organisationnelle et institutionnelle. Cette approche attribue un r\u00f4le central aux acteurs publics et aux institutions mais r\u00e9v\u00e8le, dans le m\u00eame temps, les difficult\u00e9s intrins\u00e8ques \u00e0 toute tentative de synth\u00e8se entre des th\u00e9ories souvent h\u00e9t\u00e9rog\u00e8nes.This paper examines the apparent convergence between the National Systems of Innovation approach and evolutionary theories of technological change. This convergence is organized around a complex and specific conception of the innovation process itself In this context, innovation is a cognitive, a multilevel \u0096 i.e. local, national, sectorial and international \u0096, a historical and multidimensional \u0096 i.e. technological, organizational and institutional \u0096 process. This conception gives a central place to public actors and institutions but shows the strong difficulty inherent to the elaboration of a coherent evolutionary theory of economic change. of Neurology and Neurosurgery, Montreal Neurological Institute, McGill University, Quebec, H3A 2B4, Montreal, Canada","Corresponding author. Tel: +514 398 8398; Fax: +514 398 5214; E-mail:"]}],"subject":[{"lang":["eng"],"value":"mitochondria"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"mitophagy"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Parkinson's disease"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"PINK1"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"proteases"}],"articleId":["EMBR201214"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isOpenAccess","value":"greenOpenAccess"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/WNG-QN80KL8K-K","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["article"],"abstract":"Mutations in phosphatase and tensin homologue\u2010induced kinase 1 (PINK1) cause recessively inherited Parkinson's disease (PD), a neurodegenerative disorder linked to mitochondrial dysfunction. In healthy mitochondria, PINK1 is rapidly degraded in a process involving both mitochondrial proteases and the proteasome. However, when mitochondrial import is compromised by depolarization, PINK1 accumulates on the mitochondrial surface where it recruits the PD\u2010linked E3 ubiquitin ligase Parkin from the cytosol, which in turn mediates the autophagic destruction of the dysfunctional organelles. Using an unbiased RNA\u2010mediated interference (RNAi)\u2010based screen, we identified four mitochondrial proteases, mitochondrial processing peptidase (MPP), presenilin\u2010associated rhomboid\u2010like protease (PARL), m\u2010AAA and ClpXP, involved in PINK1 degradation. We find that PINK1 turnover is particularly sensitive to even modest reductions in MPP levels. Moreover, PINK1 cleavage by MPP is coupled to import such that reducing MPP activity induces PINK1 accumulation at the mitochondrial surface, leading to Parkin recruitment and mitophagy. These results highlight a new role for MPP in PINK1 import and mitochondrial quality control via the PINK1\u2013Parkin pathway.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":24,"sectionCount":11,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":6},{"level":1,"sectionCount":5}],"sectionDepth":2,"imageCount":5,"tableCount":0,"refCount":23},"tdmReady":true,"score":8.968,"pdfWordCount":5736,"pdfCharCount":30965,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":8,"pdfPageSize":"595.276 x 782.362 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":717,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":164,"abstractCharCount":1246,"keywordCount":5},"title":"Mitochondrial processing peptidase regulates PINK1 processing, import and Parkin recruitment","pmid":["22354088"],"hasFormula":false,"genre":["article"],"host":{"title":"EMBO reports","language":["unknown"],"doi":["10.1002/(ISSN)1469-3178"],"issn":["1469-221X"],"eissn":["1469-3178"],"publisherId":["EMBR"],"volume":"13","issue":"4","pages":{"first":"378","last":"385","total":"8"},"genre":["journal"],"subject":[{"value":"Post\u2010translational Modifications, Proteolysis & Proteomics"},{"value":"Metabolism"},{"value":"Molecular Biology of Disease"},{"value":"Scientific Report"},{"value":"Scientific Reports"}]},"namedEntities":{"unitex":{"date":["2008"],"orgName":["HSFO","Stroke Foundation of Ontario","Chercheur National of the FRSQ","National Institute of Health"],"persName":["A. This article discusses the contribution of two textual data analysis computer programs. Alceste and Hyperbase. to producing results that can be communicated, verified and contested by other researchers. The two programs perform a uniform and extensive analysis of any corpus and quickly identify the points of resemblance and difference between the discourse of various individuals or groups of individuals. The programs' limits are specified, but the programs provide clear support in the description of a corpus and the interpretation of discourse recorded during research interviews.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":1,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":2,"refCount":49},"tdmReady":false,"score":6.879,"pdfWordCount":6870,"pdfCharCount":41434,"pdfVersion":1.4,"pdfPageCount":24,"pdfPageSize":"376 x 608 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":286,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":101,"abstractCharCount":724,"keywordCount":3},"title":"Apports de logiciels d'analyse de donn\u00e9es textuelles (ADT) dans les proc\u00e9dures d'analyse de contenu d'entretiens semi-directifs de recherche: Alceste et hyperbase","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"host":{"title":"un corpus de texte (d&eacute;finition de Lebart & Salem, 1994: 314)"}},{"author":[{"name":"Parmi Ceux-Ci"}],"host":{"title":"Spadt-T (Syst&egrave;me Portable pour l"},"title":"Analyse des Donn&eacute"},{"host":{"title":"seront rep&eacute;r&eacute;s sous une seule et unique forme \"pareil\". {"corpusName":"springer-journals","author":[{"name":"R\u00e9gis Malet","affiliations":["Laboratoire Cultures, Education et Soci\u00e9t\u00e9s (LACES), Equipe de Recherches Comparatives en Education et Formation (ERCEF), Universit\u00e9 de Bordeaux IV-IUFM, Bordeaux, France","E-mail: regis.malet@univ-lille3.fr"]}],"subject":[{"lang":["fre"],"value":"\u00c9ducation compar\u00e9e"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Langue"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Culture"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Comparatisme"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Herm\u00e9neutique"}],"articleId":["9245","s11159-011-9245-5"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/VQC-HB7W1WJG-P","language":["fre"],"originalGenre":["OriginalPaper"],"abstract":"R\u00e9sum\u00e9: Dans un contexte d\u2019utilisation croissante des comparaisons internationales par les instances politiques \u00e0 des fins de pilotage des syst\u00e8mes \u00e9ducatifs, par le biais notamment de l\u2019\u00e9tablissement de normes de comp\u00e9tences et donc d\u2019\u00e9valuation en vue de l\u2019introduction de r\u00e9formes, cette contribution entend d\u2019abord r\u00e9it\u00e9rer la n\u00e9cessaire distinction, op\u00e9r\u00e9e par Max Weber d\u00e8s 1922, entre l\u2019entreprise scientifique et l\u2019action politique, mais aussi et surtout rappeler le principe de s\u00e9paration et de m\u00e9diation dont rel\u00e8ve la d\u00e9marche comparative en \u00e9ducation. Les concepts qui composent une langue, circulent et s\u2019imposent dans un monde social renvoient \u00e0 une histoire, \u00e0 des usages dynamiques, et sont culturellement enracin\u00e9s. N\u00e9gliger cet ancrage social et culturel des mots expose \u00e0 la construction de la comparabilit\u00e9 sur de seules \u00e9quivalences fonctionnelles ; bien que les pressions en ce sens soient fortes, c\u2019est probablement le moyen le plus s\u00fbr de comparer l\u2019incomparable (Marcel D\u00e9tienne). La rationalit\u00e9 purement instrumentale qui favorise la diffusion de tels cadres ou sch\u00e9mas interpr\u00e9tatifs para\u00eet en effet indiff\u00e9rente aux questions du sens et de la culture, outre qu\u2019elle est irrationnelle sur le plan axiologique, si l\u2019on suit Weber. L\u2019\u00e9tranget\u00e9, si ce n\u2019est l\u2019alt\u00e9rit\u00e9, tend \u00e0 s\u2019y effacer. On se demandera donc quels enjeux impose d\u00e9sormais au comparatiste l\u2019illusion de la spontan\u00e9it\u00e9 de la traduction r\u00e9duite \u00e0 une \u00e9quivalence fonctionnelle. Dans la responsabilit\u00e9 de m\u00e9diation qui incombe au chercheur, c\u2019est \u00e0 un travail de clarification et d\u2019intercompr\u00e9hension (inspir\u00e9 de C. Taylor) qu\u2019invite la recherche, substituant \u00e0 la standardisation des mots l\u2019\u00e9clairage critique des variations s\u00e9miotiques que g\u00e9n\u00e8re leur usage.","qualityIndicators":{"pdfVersion":1.4,"abstractCharCount":1749,"pdfPageCount":17,"tdmReady":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"imageCount":8,"refCount":37,"sectionCount":5,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":5,"level":0}],"tableCount":0,"sectionDepth":1,"paragraphCount":23},"score":8.667,"pdfPageSize":"439.37 x 666.142 pts","refBibsNative":false,"keywordCount":5,"pdfWordCount":8347,"pdfWordsPerPage":491,"pdfCharCount":49027,"abstractWordCount":254,"pdfText":true,"hasStructuredBody":true},"title":"Fronti\u00e8res, traduction et politiques de la diff\u00e9rence : la t\u00e2che herm\u00e9neutique de l\u2019\u00e9ducation compar\u00e9e","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"host":{"title":"comme une responsabilit\u00e9 tant scientifique que sociale du comparatiste, a ` savoir un projet de clarification et de compr\u00e9hension interculturelle, qui passe par un travail r\u00e9flexif sur son propre dispositif de connaissance. Une approche moins formelle, sans doute plus ph\u00e9nom\u00e9nologique. On s'apercevra qu'elle ne vient pas en contradiction avec ces \u00e9pist\u00e9mologies plus formelles, mais qu'elle permet un debut de reponse aux questions ou objections que plusieurs se posent au sujet de la portee cognitive des th\u00e9ories scientifiques. Wittgenstein, par exemple, s'est montre fort insatisfait des explications \u00abillusoires\u00bb des sciences (Tract., 6.371\u20132), alors que plusieurs de nos contemporains se detournent de ce mode de connaissance, jug\u00e9 trop formel et vide.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":30,"sectionCount":10,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":10,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":1,"tableCount":0,"refCount":0},"tdmReady":true,"score":8.128,"pdfWordCount":5153,"pdfCharCount":29294,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":15,"pdfPageSize":"396.72 x 625.68 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":344,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":94,"abstractCharCount":659,"keywordCount":0},"title":"La position des entit\u00e9s th\u00e9oriques","hasFormula":false,"pii":["S0012217300021752"],"genre":["research-article"],"host":{"title":"Dialogue","language":["unknown"],"issn":["0012-2173"],"eissn":["1759-0949"],"publisherId":["DIA"],"volume":"16","issue":"2","pages":{"first":"213","last":"227","total":"15"},"genre":["journal"]},"namedEntities":{"unitex":{"date":["1977"],"placeName":["New York"]}},"ark":["ark:/67375/6GQ-V6SKF56C-9"],"categories":{"wos":[],"scienceMetrix":["1 - arts & humanities","2 - philosophy & theology","3 - philosophy"],"scopus":["1 - Social Sciences","2 - Arts and Humanities","3 - Philosophy"]},"publicationDate":"1977","copyrightDate":"1977","enrichments":{"type":["grobidFulltext","multicat","unitex"]},"doi":["10.1017/S0012217300021752"]}

Rousselon","affiliations":["Service de psychopathologie de l\u2019enfant et de l\u2019adolescent, centre L\u00e9o-Kanner, CHU h\u00f4pital-Nord, 42055 Saint-\u00c9tienne cedex, France","E-mail: valerie.rousselon@orange.fr"]}],"subject":[{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Autisme"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Troubles envahissants du d\u00e9veloppement"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"M\u00e9decine g\u00e9n\u00e9rale"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Famille"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Satisfaction"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Autism"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Pervasive developmental disorders"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"General practice"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Family"},{"lang":["fre"],"value":"Satisfaction"}],"articleId":["883"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/6H6-CR4HD1LS-X","language":["fre"],"originalGenre":["Full-length article"],"abstract":"R\u00e9sum\u00e9: Le \u00ab\u00a0projet m\u00e9dical\u00a0\u00bb du jardin d\u2019enfants th\u00e9rapeutique\u00a0(JET) du CHU de Saint-\u00c9tienne propose des soins pr\u00e9coces aux enfants de trois \u00e0 six ans souffrant de troubles envahissants du d\u00e9veloppement, jusqu\u2019\u00e0 ce qu\u2019ils atteignent l\u2019\u00e2ge d\u2019une orientation sp\u00e9cialis\u00e9e (IME, CLIS\u2026) associ\u00e9e \u00e0 des structures de soins sectorielles. Cette prise en charge institutionnelle et pluridisciplinaire s\u2019int\u00e8gre dans une offre de soins vari\u00e9e et parfois conflictuelle, laissant les professionnels dans l\u2019expectative. Une \u00e9tude qualitative a \u00e9t\u00e9 r\u00e9alis\u00e9e de juin 2011\u00a0\u00e0 avril 2012\u00a0sur un \u00e9chantillon raisonn\u00e9 de 15\u00a0familles d\u2019enfants pr\u00e9sentant un trouble envahissant du d\u00e9veloppement parmi les 91\u00a0ayant fr\u00e9quent\u00e9 le JET entre 1994\u00a0et 2010. L\u2019objectif de ce travail consistait \u00e0 \u00e9valuer le v\u00e9cu parental des soins pr\u00e9coces et l\u2019itin\u00e9raire th\u00e9rapeutique des familles. L\u2019entr\u00e9e au JET a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9crite par les parents comme inqui\u00e9tante face \u00e0 ce lieu inconnu, accueillant des enfants \u00e0 la symptomatologie h\u00e9t\u00e9rog\u00e8ne, et dans une p\u00e9riode marqu\u00e9e par la confirmation r\u00e9cente du diagnostic, l\u2019isolement familial et social au moment de l\u2019admission. La confiance dans le JET s\u2019est install\u00e9e souvent rapidement, gr\u00e2ce \u00e0 un espace unanimement qualifi\u00e9 par les parents de \u00ab\u00a0s\u00e9curitaire et protecteur\u00a0\u00bb. D\u2019autres recours ont \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9crits dans les diff\u00e9rents secteurs du soin (biom\u00e9dical, populaire ou traditionnel) plus ou moins initi\u00e9s et contr\u00f4l\u00e9s par l\u2019institution ou au contraire absolument parall\u00e8les ou occultes. L\u2019ensemble permettant aux familles de construire un savoir hybride de \u00ab\u00a0parents-experts\u00a0\u00bb. Un sentiment d\u2019abandon a souvent \u00e9t\u00e9 observ\u00e9 lors de la sortie du JET car les relais sont difficiles \u00e0 mettre en \u0153uvre du fait d\u2019une p\u00e9nurie des services m\u00e9dico-sociaux et de la faible mobilisation de professionnels-ressources dans le secteur lib\u00e9ral. Une organisation en r\u00e9seau ville-h\u00f4pital pourrait permettre d\u2019homog\u00e9n\u00e9iser les recours et de prolonger l\u2019accompagnement.","qualityIndicators":{"pdfVersion":1.7,"abstractCharCount":1957,"pdfPageCount":8,"tdmReady":true,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"imageCount":0,"refCount":15,"sectionCount":24,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":3,"level":0},{"sectionCount":6,"level":1},{"sectionCount":11,"level":2},{"sectionCount":4,"level":3}],"tableCount":2,"sectionDepth":4,"paragraphCount":42},"score":10,"pdfPageSize":"595 x 794 pts","refBibsNative":true,"keywordCount":10,"pdfWordCount":6127,"pdfWordsPerPage":766,"pdfCharCount":33249,"abstractWordCount":289,"pdfText":true,"hasStructuredBody":true},"title":"Le v\u00e9cu des soins pr\u00e9coces par les familles d\u2019enfants autistes","pii":["S0222-9617(13)00080-9"],"refBibs":[{"host":{"author":[{"name":"J Hochmann"}],"publisher":"Odile Jacob","title":"Histoire de l&amp;apos;autisme","publicationDate":"2009"}},{"author":[{"name":"A Baghdadli"},{"name":"M Noyer"},{"name":"C Aussilloux"}],"host":{"title":"CRA Languedoc Roussillon: DGAS","publicationDate":"2007"},"title":"Interventions \u00e9ducatives p\u00e9da-gogiques et th\u00e9rapeutiques propos\u00e9es dans l&amp;apos;autisme : une revue de la litt\u00e9rature"},{"host":{"title":"HAS. responsibilities"}],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/4W2-PHK9FWCB-K","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["review-article"],"abstract":"Purpose \u2013 Following the 26 December 2004 tsunami, Planet Risk NGO took part in the international research program TSUNARISK and ATIP\u2010CNRS Jeune Chercheur. The aim of this paper is to encourage the development of tsunami\u2010resilient communities essentially through educative actions. Design/methodology/approach \u2013 The tsunami risk in Indonesia was assessed by researchers. Planet Risk then used scientific findings and advice for building adapted prevention actions among Javanese populations. Findings \u2013 Many people could have survived if they had received a basic knowledge of tsunamis. The Indonesian public as well as local authorities must be educated to face tsunami risk. To be efficient, this education must be adapted to local cultural and geographical characteristics. Collaboration between researchers and practitioners is a good means of reaching such an objective. Originality/value \u2013 The paper is the result of a two\u2010year successful collaboration between interdisciplinary scientific teams and an NGO team. It demonstrates that an efficient prevention scheme can be implemented through this kind of collaboration. To the authors' knowledge it is the first time that such tsunami education programmes have been led in Indonesia.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":57,"sectionCount":13,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":10},{"level":1,"sectionCount":3}],"sectionDepth":2,"imageCount":4,"tableCount":0,"refCount":31},"tdmReady":true,"score":7.16,"pdfWordCount":7653,"pdfCharCount":43792,"pdfVersion":1.3,"pdfPageCount":17,"pdfPageSize":"519 x 680 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":450,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":180,"abstractCharCount":1238,"keywordCount":6},"title":"Tsunami\u2010resilient communities' development in Indonesia through educative actions","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"title":": Lessons from the 26 December 2004 tsunami","author":[{"name":"W.N. {"corpusName":"wiley","keywords":{"teeft":["geographie","cette","gcographie","alpes","giographie","sont","entre","regionale","cours","raoul blanchard","gkographie","etude","temp","mcme","aussi","blanchard","recherches","laval","donc","fait","certains","chercheur","comme","toutes","tous","gcncrale","chez","grenoble","raoul","champ","avec","monsieur blanchard","gcographie regionale","press universitaires laval","geographie regionale","canada franqais","geographie gcncrale","geographie rigionale","quebec","giographie alpine","daly medal","kaoul blanchard","quebec inst","etude canadiennes","relation fonctionnelles","giographie regionale","quebec meridional","french canada"]},"author":[{"name":"Louis\u2010Edmond Hamelin","affiliations":["Universit\u00e9 Laval"]}],"articleId":["CAG1922"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/WNG-9XTLRV0K-3","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["article"],"abstract":"Raoul Blanchard, one of the Honorary Presidents of the Canadian Association of Geographers, has certainly made a most voluminous contribution to geography. His writing alone covers 15,000 pages, much of it on French Canada. He has also enjoyed a remarkable professional career: his teaching, mainly at Grenoble, France, and his concurrent research on the Western Alps and on the heartland of French Canada each in themselves constitute an outstanding achievement. In the province of Quebec, Blanchard's influence on the development of the field of geography has been profound. The principal concern of this article is with Blanchard's concept of a geographer. This consideration necessitates an evaluation of Blanchard's definition of geography, the specific character of his \u201cschools,\u201d the class of people he wrote for, as well as an examination of his methods of teaching, of research. and of writing. To do this, the writer reviews Blanchard's books with the following: questions in mind: What is Blanchard's meaning of the term \u201cg\u00e9ographie r\u00e9gionale\u201d of which he is said to be a \u201cmaitre\u201d? Does he, during his career of sixty years, keep the same approach to his science? Is he the \u201cperfect geographer,\u201d or simply an outstanding representative of a glorious period in the history of French geography?","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":1}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":30},"tdmReady":false,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":206,"abstractCharCount":1303,"keywordCount":0,"score":7.472,"pdfWordCount":5493,"pdfCharCount":29583,"pdfVersion":1.3,"pdfPageCount":9,"pdfPageSize":"504.479 x 720.24 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":610,"pdfText":true},"title":"LA GEOGRAPHIE DE RAOUL BLANCHARD","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"title":"La collection compl\u00e9te de Les Alpes Occidentales","publicationDate":"1938"},{"title":["La collection compltte de","comprend 6 volumes"],"publicationDate":"1960"},{"publicationDate":"1958"},{"title":"Remise de l'\u00e9p\u00e9e d'acad\u00e9micien \u00e0 Monsieur Raoul Blanchard, doyen honoraire de In Facult\u00e9des Lettres de Grenoble, Grenoble","publicationDate":"1959"},{"title":"M\u00e9langes g\u00e9ographiques canndiens offerts \u00e0 Raoul Blanchard","publicationDate":"1959"},{"author":[{"name":"P. {"corpusName":"wiley","keywords":{"teeft":["chapitre","sont","recherche","livre","donnces","ctudiants","chercheur","entre","comme","partie","aussi","leur","cette","fois","chapitres","projet","donc","chercheurs","principe","cours","mcthodologie","choix","travail","mcthodes","souvent","leurs","ouvrage","chaque","contenu","fait","approches","administrative science revue canadienne","canadian journal","avec","chaque chapitre","dernier chapitre","sage publication","management research","leurs professeurs","version anglaise","chaque ctape","recherche quantitative","donnces qualitatives","cette partie","chapitre classique","technique disponibles","recherche qualitative","mcthodes quantitatives"]},"author":[{"name":"Jean Pasquero","affiliations":["Universit\u00e9 du Qu\u00e9bec \u00e0 Montr\u00e9al pasquero.jean@uqam.ca"]}],"articleId":["CJAS197"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/WNG-6JGD4FV9-6","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["bookReview"],"abstract":"M\u00e9thodes de recherche en management. Thi\u00e9tart, Raymond\u2010Alain et coll. Doing Management Research\u2014A Comprehensive Guide. Thi\u00e9tart, Raymond\u2010Alain et al Abstract: This book is a fine achievement. Recently translated from the French and specially adapted to Anglophone audiences, it is now available in North America under the aegis of Sage Publications. The objective of the book\u2014to provide a comprehensive yet simple guide for \u201cdoing management research\u201d\u2014is fully attained. The result of a three\u2010year collaboration among 22 European researchers, the book is built around the major issues that researchers preparing for a significant project must confront upon putting together a research proposal. One of its merits is its original combination of French clarity and North American pragmatism. The mix of soul\u2010searching issues, principles, techniques, and applications sets it apart from the current production in the field. Readers are always made aware of the choices they can make and the consequences of each choice for the future of their research project. Another merit of the book is its full integration across chapters, both in contents and style. The approach is unusually balanced, as quantitative and qualitative research methods are given equal status. The main pedagogical messages the book conveys are that research questions should drive methodology and not the other way around, that methodological purism is often unproductive, and that researchers must continually strive to maintain consistency between their objectives and their methods. A vast array of real research examples taken from empirical articles or monographs helps make sense of the issues discussed. For its exceptional integration between sound principles and practical methods, the book is definitely a must on the shelves of graduate students and professors of management alike.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":1}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":0},"tdmReady":false,"score":8,"pdfWordCount":4333,"pdfCharCount":24551,"pdfVersion":1.4,"pdfPageCount":6,"pdfPageSize":"576 x 792 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":722,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":false,"abstractWordCount":276,"abstractCharCount":1861,"keywordCount":0},"title":"Book Review Recension de livre","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[],"genre":["book-reviews"],"host":{"title":"Canadian Journal of Administrative Sciences / Revue Canadienne des Sciences de l'Administration","language":["unknown"],"doi":["10.1002/(ISSN)1936-4490"],"issn":["0825-0383"],"eissn":["1936-4490"],"publisherId":["CJAS"],"volume":"19","issue":"2","pages":{"first":"197","last":"202","total":"6"},"genre":["journal"]},"namedEntities":{"unitex":{"persName":["D. This study examines arguments concerning the replacement of labor union activists by professional labor union employees, a modification supposedly associated with the current crisis of labor unions. The Job position of labor union organizer is analyzed through its historical development. An empirical research in the field with two labor federations was carried out to reconstitute the stages of a union career. The central part of the recherche consists of the production of interviews with union representatives. This social-historical approach reveals the fragile and unfinished character of the professionalization of labor union management. {"corpusName":"sage","keywords":{"teeft":["elle","peut","sont","leur","cette","faire","entre","lors","doit","comme","retranscriptions","chercheur","fait","souvent","travail","avec","effet","compte","dont","propos","entretiens","retranscription","cela","ceux","notamment","encore","parfois","parce","rendre","front national","rencontre","social science information","moins","elles","peuvent","mettre","risque","sociaux","politiques","fois","objet","celui","proximit","doute","certaines","tels","faut","dire","celle","complicit","universitaire","jouer","ailleurs","dissimuler","ainsi","mieux","professionnel","prendre","moyens","toute","hein","certaine","pouvoir","donner","rendre compte","fois encore","toujours","femmes","sans","tels propos","elles sont","parti","populaires","milieu social","camp national","milieu populaires","sans doute","bonnes raisons","parole","milieu"]},"author":[{"name":"MARCHAND-LAGIER Christ\u00e8le","affiliations":["Universit\u00e9 dAvignon,","christelemarchand@neuf.fr"]}],"subject":[{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Communication \u00e9crite"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Espace social"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Front National"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Genre"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Reconnaissance professionnelle"},{"lang":["eng"],"value":"Retranscription d\u2019entretien"}],"articleId":["10.1177_0539018409344785"],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/M70-TVRR5Z7P-C","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["other"],"abstract":"This article analyses what is involved when reporting on an oral exchange between an interviewer and an interviewee. The vote for the Front National which is peculiar and stigmatized, offers an opportunity to measure all the difficulties met by the researcher (especially the female researcher) when trying to report on the relations established during interviews. Too close a relation with the sample population \u2014 as regards gender and social background \u2014 can be a handicap. Indeed, the researcher finds him/herself torn between the need to reveal an in-depth knowledge of the population and the desire for academic recognition. Moreover, in order to report on the interview, the researcher is forced into the delicate position of having to reveal details of his/her own background. In conclusion, scripts unveil to a great extent the social situation of those concerned, and can therefore weaken the results of the scientific study.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"pub2tei","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":1,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":0,"refCount":21},"tdmReady":false,"score":7.299,"pdfWordCount":8502,"pdfCharCount":46325,"pdfVersion":1.4,"pdfPageCount":19,"pdfPageSize":"391.181 x 612.283 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":447,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":136,"abstractCharCount":922,"keywordCount":6},"title":"De la connaissance \u00e0 la reconnaissance: la retranscription d\u2019entretien comme marqueur social","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"host":{"title":"Guide de l\u2019enqu\u00eate de terrain","author":[{"name":" Beaud, S."},{"name":" Weber, F."},{"name":" Beaud, S."},{"name":" Weber, F."}]}},{"title":"\u2018De la relation ethnographique: \u00e0 la recherche de la juste distance\u2019","author":[{"name":" Bensa, A."}],"host":{"title":"Enqu\u00eate","author":[{"name":" Bensa, A."}],"pages":{"first":"131","last":"40"}}},{"title":"\u2018Que faire des exp\u00e9riences d\u2019enqu\u00eate? mbiro@ulb.ac.be"]}],"accessCondition":{"contentType":"isNotOpenAccess","value":"closed"},"arkIstex":"ark:/67375/HCB-NLH73VC6-D","language":["eng"],"originalGenre":["OriginalPaper"],"abstract":"Abstract: Throughout this book, a number of issues are raised that cast some shadow on the experimental methodology that is currently adopted in the vast majority of the works proposing an empirical evaluation of metaheuristics. Indeed, in the combinatorial optimization field it is common to encounter works in which some dubious procedure is adopted for assessing the algorithms under analysis and in which no clear statement is made on how the values of the parameters are obtained. Apparently, the need for a thorough revision of the research methodology in the optimization field is shared by many members of the research community as it is testified by the interest raised during the last years by a number of methodological articles appeared in the main journals of the community-the works by Barr et al. (1995), Hooker (1995), and Rardin & Uzsoy (2001) published in the Journal of Heuristics are just a representative sample. In this chapter, we intend to complement the existing literature with the analysis of some fundamental issues that remained so far under-explored. In particular, we focus on the problems connected with the tuning of metaheuristics. Indeed, tuning is a particularly critical element when metaheuristics are assessed and compared, being related with many different catches that might invalidate the results. Among them, we study the risks deriving from adopting the same set of instances for tuning a metaheuristic and for then assessing its performance. In the context of this study, we introduce the concept of over-tuning which is akin to over-fitting in supervised learning.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":true,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":94,"sectionCount":13,"sectionLevels":[{"level":0,"sectionCount":13}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":8,"tableCount":0,"refCount":0},"tdmReady":true,"refBibsNative":false,"abstractWordCount":254,"abstractCharCount":1610,"keywordCount":0,"score":10,"pdfWordCount":10328,"pdfCharCount":52288,"pdfVersion":1.6,"pdfPageCount":25,"pdfPageSize":"430 x 659.996 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":413,"pdfText":true},"title":"Some Considerations on the Experimental Methodology","hasFormula":true,"chapterId":["6","Chap6"],"refBibs":[],"genre":["article"],"serie":{"title":"Studies in Computational Intelligence","language":["unknown"],"copyrightDate":"2009","issn":["1860-949X"],"eissn":["1860-9503"],"editor":[{"name":"Janusz Kacprzyk","affiliations":["Systems Research Institute, Polish Academy of Sciences, ul. The description and the justification of procedures developed by these methodological operations will lead me to the discussion of the conditions of validity and use of certain methods of scientific investigation : classic methods -- observations, interviews, etc. -- or more uncommon -- action research-intervention, scenarios method. I will also show the triple advantage of methodological adaptation and field embeddedness: permitting the research to translate his or her subject and objectives into terms compatible with the type of intended intelligibility; to permit access to field work that can prove to be fruitful for both the research and the actors; construct a research format adapted to the actors' experience and permitting the translation of the researcher's abstract questioning into terms compatible with this experience.","qualityIndicators":{"hasStructuredBody":false,"teiSource":"grobid","xmlStats":{"paragraphCount":1,"sectionCount":1,"sectionLevels":[{"sectionCount":1,"level":0}],"sectionDepth":1,"imageCount":0,"tableCount":3,"refCount":31},"tdmReady":false,"score":7.815,"pdfWordCount":8688,"pdfCharCount":51289,"pdfVersion":1.4,"pdfPageCount":20,"pdfPageSize":"380 x 613 pts","pdfWordsPerPage":434,"pdfText":true,"refBibsNative":true,"abstractWordCount":179,"abstractCharCount":1201,"keywordCount":5},"title":"Plaidoyer pour le bricolage et l'enracinement des m\u00e9thodes d'enqu\u00eate dans le terrain","hasFormula":false,"refBibs":[{"host":{"author":[{"name":"Comme L&apos;expliquent Callon"},{"name":"Latour"}],"title":"la meilleure fa&ccedil;on de comprendre une innovation est d'analyser les controverses qui &eacute;maill&egrave;rent sa mise en oeuvre. Si le th\u00e9rapeute ne respecte pas les conditions d\u2019applications des tests statistiques, les valeurs ne seront pas fausses parce que le test ne se trompe pas, mais l\u2019analyse statistique employ\u00e9e le sera. Le r\u00e9sultat de l\u2019analyse statistique d\u00e9pend de nombreux param\u00e8tres qu\u2019il est important de ma\u00eetriser afin de se prot\u00e9ger d\u2019\u00e9ventuelles erreurs. La litt\u00e9rature n\u2019est pas exempte de ces erreurs, il est donc primordial d\u2019accorder une attention particuli\u00e8re aux traitements statistiques des donn\u00e9es. L\u2019interpr\u00e9tation du r\u00e9sultat se rapporte \u00e0 la question pos\u00e9e par l\u2019\u00e9tude ou aux hypoth\u00e8ses pos\u00e9es au d\u00e9part.
